website_summaries.verdict: Large microfiber towel that is extremely absorbent while folding up tightly.
pros: Lightweight towel that's perfect for carrying to the beach because it folds down to a small size
Large towel measures 73 inches x 76 inches
Microfiber materials dry much more quickly than cotton
Works equally well for use at the beach or at home
cons: Price is pretty high for the large-size towel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome towel
customer_reviews.text: Soft, easily packable, supercute and sleek design, and love the unexpected case it came with! It is very absorbent for my needs, and dries quickly as advertised. It doesn't seem to hold smells, and washes up just fine. Super stoked to have this towel!
customer_reviews.author: Noe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need
customer_reviews.text: We are using the blanket for a different purpose than advertised - to keep our cats from getting fur all over the bed in guest bedroom. It is perfect. It covers a queen size bed, is soft and easy to clean. So I would especially recommend it to keep unwanted fur off of furniture. But it can be really handy to put on the floor where a baby is playing or be the start of a fun tent. And it's great to take quick naps on too.
customer_reviews.author: CLSR

customer_reviews.title: Not a beach towel!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin suede cloth fabric, think of a cheap Native American Halloween costume. If you are thinking this will work as a beach towel don't bother. It's just a piece of rectangle fabric that has finished edges. I didn't bother opening it all the way up to check out the quality of the fabric but from what I felt it seems like fabric I could buy at a fabric store for about $7/ yard.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great! ...but needs to be washed gently...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!! I accidentally bought 4 of these because they were delivered in quantities of 2 and I ordered 2 but I kept all 4 because THEY ARE GREAT! Very lightweight. Very large. Very breathable. Very easy to travel with. The material doesn’t stick to your skin and it shakes off sand so easily! BE CAREFUL WHEN WASHING! I threw 1 in the washer with some jeans and some zippered skirts and it tore up some of the edge stitching :( Wash these towels on a Delicates setting with lots of cold water!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Eilert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beach gear
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and we go to the beach every weekend, this towel is really different compared to regular ones found on wall mart/target/ costco, really high end product. I do recommend you to have this one.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Y. Hirata

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had doubts about microfiber towels because this is really thin, but I used at the beach and is amazing how absorbent it is and is incredible how a really huge towel could fit perfect in the small bag (actually it comes with a really nice bag). The quality is fantastic, high-end product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used it the other day with my 2 girls, and I liked that is very lightweight to carry it around, we can lay on it very comfortably and then I put it back in the bag sooo easily. The microfiber material is different than a regular towel, so it takes a while to get used to, but it's actually much more practical. Also the design is very cute. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. I used this at the beach for about a week and a half and it was wonderful. Sand brushed off easily. Dries quickly. Not only is it useful but super cute. I was a little worried about stains since its white but My husband spilled some red juice over it and I was able to get it out with some spot remover twice applied and it washed out great. Very impressed! It's also really soft :)
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Not lightweight and packable
customer_reviews.text: I was Really looking for something compact and small and light! This is NOT the answer if that’s what what you’re looking for. It comes in a bag about 8x10 and i can guarantee you if i unfold It there is NO WAY to get it back inside of the bag it’s also much heavier than expected. Not to mention when you tough it, the handfeel is cringeworthy....Looks like I’m sticking to my old bedsheet for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Really soft
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, absorbent towel. Very thin so doesn’t take up a lot of room in washer.
customer_reviews.author: lsmdtb5

customer_reviews.title: These towels are a free spa day, at home
customer_reviews.text: I like the vibrant colors It makes awesome quick wrap It so light and easy to use I'm dedicated to truly HOT baths I use 2 towels at the same time 1 to dry off with on the Terry cloth side and the 2 one I lay on velour side relax for a minute before dressing I would love too see more colors floral designs
customer_reviews.author: BENITA ARMBRISTER

customer_reviews.title: Great towel
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel. It is compact and absorbent. I have washed it many times and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Barnette

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: After the first wash (recommended by the seller) the softness of the blanket increased. Very good material. Super absorbent and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good qyality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fabric good quality nice design with the small palm trees
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G. Mazzone

customer_reviews.title: The towel is a great size and does the job at wicking away water ...
customer_reviews.text: The towel is a great size and does the job at wicking away water quickly, as well as drying way quicker than the typical cotton towels. The only drawback is that the white color does get dirty easily, and it seems to be holding the stain even after washing with every other use. Great towel, just probably won't be buying white next time.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for social distancing on the beach or picnic ! Just the right size to allow for staying safe during the current pandemic !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  Edra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I thought it would be and exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Al M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect towel for travelers
customer_reviews.text: very soft, pack really small and it was so easy to put it back in the bag. The coolest thing is how thin it is but incredible absorbent. Very worth purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great towel.
customer_reviews.text: This beach towel was big and light weight. Every easy to shack off the sand and folded up small for compact storage in tybee beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy  F

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel
customer_reviews.text: This works better than expected. Super big and super absorbent. The best thing about it is that it folds up and tucks away very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great material, dries fast!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these towels. Perfect for beach or picnic. Dry fast and sand just falls off of it. Like material.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket0415

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach and camping blanket
customer_reviews.text: Great beach blanket, huge, soft and incredible easy to pack. Also great for camping!
customer_reviews.author: Constanza Eglinton

customer_reviews.title: love these towels
customer_reviews.text: love these towels, different than what you might be used to but they work great, quick drying. i especially love how they fold into a small carrying case which makes it much easier to pack things for the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Great all around beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Great beach blanket, perfect size for my fiancée and I to relax and soak up some sun
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and very large. Just used it yesterday on the beach was 4 of us plus a baby all laying down on it. Plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Samoa

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this towel, so much I have ordered 4 more, it is great quality, awesome absorbing, and it is great for travel, love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Super Practical! Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome size and texture! We bought it thinking to give it as a present but we finally kept it for us given how practical it is. Above expectations!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Eguiguren

customer_reviews.title: Loooveeee it!
customer_reviews.text: bought it to go to the Beach and it was great buy. it’s is very light but also super absorbent. It’s also really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old loves it! It’s large and beautiful. Not sure why it caught me off guard that it’s thin, but it does make it easier to carry!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dean

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of this towel is extremely soft. It’s cute and the perfect size... Bought in advance for this year’s beach and pool trips. Can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice to see thickness
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size beach towel. But it wasn’t what I was expecting. It’s very thin, thought with the size of it it might be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. I hardly write reviews (mostly out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I hardly write reviews (mostly out of laziness) but this product deserves it. It is comfortable. Great size. Lightweight. I love the design as well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Just took it for a beach trip. Nice and big but folds up without taking up any space!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gottschall

customer_reviews.title: Not a towel
customer_reviews.text: It's not a towel. It feels and looks like a blanket or flannel sheet. Husband isn't happy with me ordering this item now that we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Brought it with me on vacation to the beach for a week. It worked and looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Conway

customer_reviews.title: Not typical, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was very shocked how thin it was. Not a typical towel, but works well. Going to fit so easily in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Was somewhat skeptical because of how thin it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was somewhat skeptical because of how thin it is but it works. Concerned about durability. Very handy towel
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: Too Small - Not Good At All!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a small beach blanket this is it. I am 5'2 and it was way to short. Would have returned it but I had to use it. MISTAKE!! No way does more than 1 person fit on this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: It's very large but has a weird feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving this towel-lightweight and so absorbent. Looking forward to taking it with me when I travel.

customer_reviews.title: Great beach blanket for a day on the beach!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the microfiber material and how large it is, perfect to take to the beach with the kids..
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not a traditional beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I thought. Felt more like a table cloth than a beach towel. I returned it because it wasn't what I expected so I couldn't tell you if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Desantis

customer_reviews.title: Size and texture & how fast it dries
customer_reviews.text: Incredible absorbent and so thin! Best towel for couples !
customer_reviews.author: Jorge M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a towel
customer_reviews.text: This is not a towel or towel material, it is more like a beach mat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to clean even when wet sand got on the towel.
customer_reviews.author: NASty

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but it didn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by how fast this worked and how much water it could hold. I might buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: High expectations, came as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great beach towel, have not washed it yet.

customer_reviews.title: Would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t consider it a towel, more like a odd shaped blanket. Looked cheap and did not absorb water.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this beach blanket it’s large
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this beach blanket it’s large, it’s soft, it’s light to fit into your beach bag. Keeps you cool much cooler than a towel!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dornik

customer_reviews.title: Nice Towel
customer_reviews.text: The overall weight of the towel was heavier than I expected but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough that I'm thinking about a second one so ...
customer_reviews.text: Less bulky than typical beach/pool towels. Solid quality so far - still a bright white color after running through the wash. Nice enough that I'm thinking about a second one so I don't have to wait for it to go through the wash/dry cycle before using it again.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Loved the size
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size, super soft and confortable. Great for sharing at the beach or picnic at the park. Beautiful design. Packing up after a long, nice day at the beach can be a pain but this towel makes packing easy, no hustle folding and putting back in the carrying bag. Will absolutely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Berckhoff

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Towel!
customer_reviews.text: Returned. This is NOT a microfiber "towel". It's a thin sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely the biggest size towel I found and considering its size it is very easy to pack and once packed it is very small and easy to carry. Also I was very impressed about how absorbent it is. I loved the design and how soft the material is.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Verdugo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping or beach trip and much bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent towel. It is huge but folds down perfectly for a beach or camping trip but is also perfect for use at home or the gym. The design is cool and it is great quality for the price - we will be ordering an extra one for our next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Towel I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: My wife fell in love with this product. Very absorbent, excellent quality and designed to fit in small places when transporting. I definitely recommend for gift during coming holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Soldado

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I got surprised for the quality and size of this towel. Perfect to spend a quality time in the beach with your date or family. I totally recommend this towel guys!
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality. Easy to pack. Good for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product but it came all dirty full of black ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product but it came all dirty full of black spots im just going to wash it see if it comes off
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size
customer_reviews.text: My towel is not at all how it looked in th picture. It’s just a bit bigger than a standard towel. In the photos it appeared to be very large where multiple people can sit on it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and stained
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin material, looks more like a sheet than a towel. Arrived with stains.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NOT A TOWEL! CLOSER TO A THIN MICROFIBRE BLANKET/SHEET
customer_reviews.text: They justify selling a sheet by calling it a "microfibre" towel. You could not dry off with this. It might work as a beach blanket but so would the sheet off my bed. Very misleading. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: more like a giant dust cloth
customer_reviews.text: Not the texture of material I was loookog for. This is hardly a towel... more like a giant dust cloth
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: Super Towel
customer_reviews.text: I like to get out of the shower and wrap myself around with a towel and get dry. The sensation of it feeling more like a sheet than a towel feels strange to start with... You get dry much faster than using a cotton bathsheet. Also the Microfiber gets dry quickly after use....Great idea that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Love this towel!
customer_reviews.text: I take this to the beach every time I go! perfect size for 2 people to stretch out on or several to sit out of the sand. Sand shakes off pretty easy when you're done and it fits back in it's little bag to carry around easy.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This towel is perfect for the beach. You can comfortably fit two adults on it. It’s jusy heavy enough to not move much in windy conditions. If dries very fast. The white color will quickly become sand colored, so it won’t look great after a few uses, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: @KP_Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best towel
customer_reviews.text: Seems dumb to even like a towel as much as I like this one. It isn't anti-sand or anything but definitely less of a hassle than regular towels. It is super absorbent and folds down so small! I get a lot of compliments on it - have you ever gotten a compliment on a towel? No? That's because towels are just towels EXCEPT for this towel - which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A good value for a towel this size
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but it is more like a microfiber blanket then it is like a microfiber towel. As a beach towel it serves its purpose to sit upon. I don't know how absorbent it will be. I'm not using it for that purpose. But it is soft and cool nice-looking and fun.
customer_reviews.author: RobAFett

customer_reviews.title: The best ever beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - my girlfriend had it and I immediately came home and ordered it! So soft!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, this was a gift for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Really absorbs water well. Very elegant in white and black design
customer_reviews.author: Skattie75

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: Is so compact, and it absorbs much better than normal beach towel. Also, it seems to dry much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The sands easily gets off
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once to lay it on the floor during our cruise when we docked in one of the Carribean Islands. The sands easily gets off. It is soft. Not sure how it is when it get wet though.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived way smaller than ordered. Basically the “double” is the size of a face cloth Utter joke.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great towel, nice and big. Dries fast and the sand doesn't stick.

customer_reviews.title: Beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: The beach blanket is better after wash,& stains come out good.but thought it be bit larger.but good quality!!

customer_reviews.title: thirsty
customer_reviews.text: sent as a gift to texas and the response was great.....delivered on time and as advertised......will use this vendor in the future

customer_reviews.title: Table cloth not a towel
customer_reviews.text: This product is more like a table cloth than a towel. That is not necessarily bad, but there is no terry cloth like a towel would have.
customer_reviews.author: D. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Dual Service
customer_reviews.text: Great design, light in weight. Fold in hall, use as a beach towel. Use full size as a beach blanket.

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Used as a beach blanket

customer_reviews.title: Get it

customer_reviews.title: Sand comes right off.

customer_reviews.title: Great towel! Definitely coming to be beach with us ...
customer_reviews.text: Great towel! Definitely coming to be beach with us this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Actually not my favorite thing to lie on
customer_reviews.text: Actually not my favorite thing to lie on, although it does repel sand. But feels slick when you’re on it, and is not good if you’re damp. So you end up needing two towels, one to dry off and one to lie on and that defeated my purpose of packing less towels.
customer_reviews.author: PearlMac

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality beach towel ..Incredibly easy to fold and place back in the bag, exactly as described . Perfect for my beach trips with the family ..

customer_reviews.title: O K
customer_reviews.text: This "towel" looks more like a silk sheet. Gets dirty quick because it's white, doesn't dry quick however easy to pack, nice pattern and soft.

product_meta.title: Microfiber Beach Towel Large & Oversized - 73"X36" | Beach Blanket, Large Beach Towels, Best for Camping, Sports, Travels, Quick Drying and Super Absorbent Technology
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL SAND FREE BEACH TOWEL: The ideal quick dry towel for travel. Dries 3 times faster than a normal cotton towel! A COMPACT beach towel, includes travel accessory pouch
QUICK DRY MATERIAL: Feels different, dries great. You're going to love the smooth, soft feel and they are highly absorbent - sucking the moisture right off your skin!
EXTRA LARGE BEACH TOWEL: 73x36 in. large beach towel packs back in its bag easily and compact.
PERFECT FOR VACATION: Our Extra Large size covers a whole sun lounger
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Love it or your money back. 30 day returns policy and 12 month warranty included.
